text: SELECT Student.id, Student.name_firstname, Student.name_surname, AVG(Enrollment.exam_mark) as avg_exam mark’, AVG(Enrollment.practical_mark) as 'avg practical_mark’ FROM Student, Enrollment WHERE Enrollment.student_id = Student.id AND (Student.name_surname = "Smith" OR Student.name_surname = "Saunders") GROUP BY Student.id El - -]
